hero.title: The greatest stories are those shared with friends and colleagues.

aboutUs.title: Who We Are
aboutUs.description: After exploring every corner of Colombia and traveling the world, we realized we needed to make things happen. That's how Wonder was born,
aboutUs.purpose: with the purpose of transforming tourism and revealing the true potential of our country with disruptive experiences.
aboutUs.subtitle: We are dedicated to creating trips that transcend conventional tourism
aboutUs.impact: We see tourism as a tool for social development and are passionate about working with local communities in large cities and emerging destinations.

proposal.title: But to achieve this, we first ensure:
proposal.cxDesc: Highly trained, knowledgeable staff providing exceptional care, worry-free planning, and personalized attention.
proposal.authenticDesc: Genuine encounters with locals in “add-ons” and trip extensions to off-the-beaten-path destinations.
proposal.safetyDesc: Expert risk management across ten key areas—from planning to execution—ensures your safety in both wilderness and urban tourism.

groupsTypes.description: Bringing together groups of 30+ people for shared adventures and lasting memories.

universityGroups.title: Corporate
universityGroups.description: Elevate your team's potential with tailor-made, disruptive, and transformative experiences designed to inspire creativity and drive team-building. We connect your team with locals through authentic experiences that foster deeper understanding and meaningful connections.

list.mba: 1. Incentive trips and retreats for decision makers.

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: The impact behind our value proposition
impact.text: With over 80% of our clients from the US and Europe, we've welcomed 7,000+ travelers and created meaningful experiences across 25+ destinations throughout Colombia, from the vibrant streets of Cartagena to the coffee mountains and beyond.

addOns.title: Customized Add-ons for your corporate incentive trips
addOns.description: Add-ons allow your group (incentive trips or retreats) to split into smaller groups to enjoy customizable activities tailored to the diverse interests and preferences of your team members.

benefit1.title: Diverse Interests
benefit1.text: Cater to different preferences within your team.

benefit2.title: Flexible Groups
benefit2.text: Split into smaller, more manageable groups.

benefit3.title: Customizable
benefit3.text: Tailored activities for every team member.
